price: Rabbiin waadaa Isaa kan ergamtoota Isaatiif gale diigaa ta’uu hin yaadin. Dhugumatti, Rabbiin injifataa, abbaa haaloo bahannaati.
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
